name: Intermediate Financial Accounting I
description: Together with MGAC02H3/(MGTC08H3), this course examines financial reporting in Canada. Through case analysis and the technical material covered, students will build on their knowledge covered in MGAB01H3/(MGTB05H3), MGAB02H3/(MGTB06H3) and, to a lesser extent, MGAB03H3)/(MGTB03H3).
prerequisites: Completion of 8.0 full credits including MGAB03H3/(MGTB03H3) and MGAB02H3/(MGTB06H3)
